description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. UnBound is an open world, Action-Adventure game where players can explore various worlds and complete difficult challenges to unlock new areas. Collect Orbs scattered across the world to level up your Skills, or to complete challenges. With 3 game modes and 7 different worlds to explore, UnBound brings a unique gameplay experience to Xbox Live Indie Games.
